title: Using net.cuda crashes the kernel
body_html:
I can train the model on the cpu but usingnet.cuda() crashes the kernel and the following message is displayed:
The kernel appears to have died. It will restart automatically.

The stack trace of the error in my terminal is:
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/data/users/soumith/miniconda2/conda-bld/pytorch-0.1.7_1485445763020/work/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c line=66 error=30 : unknown error terminate called after throwing an instance of 'THException'
what(): cuda runtime error (30) : unknown error at /data/users/soumith/miniconda2/conda-bld/pytorch-0.1.7_1485445763020/work/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c:66
body_text:
I can train the model on the cpu but usingnet.cuda() crashes the kernel and the following message is displayed:
The kernel appears to have died. It will restart automatically.
The stack trace of the error in my terminal is:
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/data/users/soumith/miniconda2/conda-bld/pytorch-0.1.7_1485445763020/work/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c line=66 error=30 : unknown error terminate called after throwing an instance of 'THException'
what():  cuda runtime error (30) : unknown error at /data/users/soumith/miniconda2/conda-bld/pytorch-0.1.7_1485445763020/work/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c:66
body:
I can train the model on the cpu but using`net.cuda()` crashes the kernel and the following message is displayed:
The kernel appears to have died. It will restart automatically.

The stack trace of the error in my terminal is: 
`THCudaCheck FAIL file=/data/users/soumith/miniconda2/conda-bld/pytorch-0.1.7_1485445763020/work/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c line=66 error=30 : unknown error
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'THException'`
  `what():  cuda runtime error (30) : unknown error at /data/users/soumith/miniconda2/conda-bld/pytorch-0.1.7_1485445763020/work/torch/lib/THC/THCGeneral.c:66
`
